extendedInfo.description: A trouble-free, fast and simple to use unit converter that supports the multi-unit conversion! Convert from known to unknown unit and vice versa on your Android device. Available range of conversion includes the Basic domains like Temperature, Length, Weight, .Speed, Volume, Area, Mass, Time. You can choose different conversion units available in each domain for conversions in a clean interface.Features:â¢ Easy Selection of units.â¢ Implementation of wheel pickerUnit Converter includes:1.
